i < nums.Length; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < nums.Length; j++) { if (i != j) { if (nums[i] + nums[j] == target) { return new int[] { i, j }; } } } } return null; } public class ListNode { public int val; public ListNode next; public ListNode(int val = 0, ListNode next = null) { this.val = val; this.next = next; } } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeä¸¤æ•°ç›¸åŠ ï¼ˆæŠ„æ¥çš„å¹¶ä¸”å·²ç»æäº¤ï¼‰ /// </summary> /// <param name="l1"></param> /// <param name="l2"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static ListNode AddTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) { ListNode dummyHead = new ListNode(-1); ListNode pre = dummyHead; int t = 0; while (l1 != null || l2 != null || t != 0) { if (l1 != null) { t += l1.val; l1 = l1.next; } if (l2 != null) { t += l2.val; l2 = l2.next; } pre.next = new ListNode(t % 10); pre = pre.next; t /= 10; } return dummyHead.next; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeå›æ–‡æ•° /// </summary> /// <param name="x"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static bool IsPalindrome(int x) { if (x < 0) { return false; } string num = x.ToString(); List<string> list = new List<string>(); for (int i = 0; i < num.Length; i++) { list.Add(num[i].ToString()); } var arr = list.ToArray(); Array.Reverse(arr); string num2 = string.Empty; for (int i = 0; i < arr.Length; i++) { num2 += arr[i].ToString(); } return x == Convert.ToInt32(num2); //åˆ«äººçš„æ–¹æ³• //if (x < 0) // return false; //int rem = 0, y = 0; //int quo = x; //while (quo != 0) //{ // rem = quo % 10; // y = y * 10 + rem; // quo = quo / 10; //} //return y == x; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeæœ‰æ•ˆçš„æ‹¬å· /// </summary> /// <param name="s"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static bool IsValid(string s) { while (s.Contains("()") || s.Contains("{}") || s.Contains("[]")) { s = s.Replace("()", "").Replace("{}", "").Replace("[]", ""); } return s.Length == 0; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeå„ä½ç›¸åŠ  /// </summary> /// <param name="num"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int AddDigits(int num) { //string number = num.ToString(); //int x = 0; //while (Convert.ToInt32(number) >= 10) //{ // for (int i = 0; i < number.Length; i++) // { // x += Convert.ToInt32(number[i].ToString()); // } // if (x >= 10) // { // number = x.ToString(); // x = 0; // continue; // } // return x; //} //return num; //åˆ«äººçš„æ–¹æ³• return (num - 1) % 9 + 1; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeå¯»æ‰¾ä¸¤ä¸ªæ­£åºæ•°ç»„çš„ä¸­ä½æ•° /// </summary> /// <param name="nums1"></param> /// <param name="nums2"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static double FindMedianSortedArrays(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) { List<int> list = new List<int>(); list.AddRange(nums1); list.AddRange(nums2); list.Sort(); int count = 0; if (list.Count % 2 == 0) { count = list.Count / 2; double num = list[count - 1] + list[count]; return Convert.ToDouble(num / 2); } list.Add(list[list.Count - 1]); list.Sort(); count = list.Count / 2; return list[count - 1]; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeå¿«ä¹æ•° /// </summary> /// <param name="n"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static bool IsHappy(int n) { if (n == 1) { return true; } List<int> list = new List<int>();//å­˜ä¸€ä¸ªæ•° while (n > 1) { int num2 = 0; string num = n.ToString(); for (int i = 0; i < num.Length; i++) { num2 += Convert.ToInt32(num[i].ToString()) * Convert.ToInt32(num[i].ToString()); } list.Add(num2); if (list.Where(s => s.Equals(num2)).ToList().Count > 1) { //å¦‚æœå¤šæ¬¡å¾ªç¯åˆ™è¿”å›false GC.Collect(); return false; } if (num2 == 1) { return true; } n = num2; } return false; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeåŠ ä¸€ /// </summary> /// <param name="digits"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int[] PlusOne(int[] digits) { List<int> list = new List<int>(); list.AddRange(digits); for (int i = digits.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { if (digits[i] != 9) { //ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯æœ€åä¸€ä½æ•°ä¸ä¸º9ç›´æ¥+1è¿”å›ç»“æœ digits[i]++; return digits; } //å¦åˆ™å½“å‰ä¸‹æ ‡æ•°è¿›ä½æ»¡10ä¸º0 digits[i] = 0; } //å¾ªç¯èµ°å®Œè¯´æ˜å…¨æ˜¯9ï¼Œé•¿åº¦+1 int[] arr = new int[digits.Length + 1]; arr[0] = 1; GC.Collect(); return arr; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeç§»åŠ¨é›¶ /// </summary> /// <param name="nums"></param> public static void MoveZeroes(int[] nums) { int length = nums.Length; int i, j = 0; for (i = 0; i < length; i++) { if (nums[i] != 0) { nums[j] = nums[i]; j++; } } while (j < length) { nums[j++] = 0; } GC.Collect(); } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeå°†æ‰¾åˆ°çš„å€¼ä¹˜ä»¥2 /// </summary> /// <param name="nums"></param> /// <param name="original"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int FindFinalValue(int[] nums, int original) { for (int i = 0; i < nums.Length; i++) { if (nums[i] == original) { GC.Collect(); return FindFinalValue(nums, original *= 2); } } GC.Collect(); return original; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeæ’åˆ—ç¡¬å¸ /// </summary> /// <param name="n"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int ArrangeCoins(int n) { if (n == 1) { return 1; } int count = 0; int m = n; for (int i = 1; i < m; i++) { if (n - i >= 0) { n -= i; count++; continue; } return count; } GC.Collect(); return count; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeä¸¤æ•´æ•°ç›¸åŠ  /// </summary> /// <param name="num1"></param> /// <param name="num2"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int Sum(int num1, int num2) { return num1 + num2; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeåªå‡ºç°ä¸€æ¬¡çš„æ•°å­—ï¼ˆæŠ„æ¥çš„æœªæäº¤ï¼‰ /// </summary> /// <param name="nums"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int SingleNumber(int[] nums) { return nums.Aggregate((a, b) => a ^ b); } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeåªå‡ºç°ä¸€æ¬¡çš„æ•°å­— /// </summary> /// <param name="nums"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int SingleNumber(int[] nums) { List<int> list = new List<int>(); list.AddRange(nums); for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++) { if (list.Where(s => s == list[i]).ToList().Count == 1) { return list[i]; } } return 0; } /// <summary> /// LeetCode 2çš„å¹‚ /// </summary> /// <param name="n"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static bool IsPowerOfTwo(int n) { if (n == 1) { return true; } if (n % 2 != 0 || n <= 0) { return false; } return IsPowerOfTwo(n / 2); } /// <summary> /// LeetCode 3çš„å¹‚ /// </summary> /// <param name="n"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static bool IsPowerOfThree(int n) { if (n == 1) { return true; } if (n % 3 != 0 || n <= 0) { return false; } return IsPowerOfThree(n / 3); } /// <summary> /// LeetCode 4çš„å¹‚ /// </summary> /// <param name="n"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static bool IsPowerOfFour(int n) { if (n == 1) { return true; } if (n % 4 != 0 || n < 0) { return false; } return IsPowerOfFour(n / 4); } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeç¬¬ä¸‰å¤§çš„æ•° /// </summary> /// <param name="n"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int ThirdMax(int[] nums) { Array.Sort(nums); Array.Reverse(nums); nums = nums.Distinct().ToArray(); if (nums.Length >= 3) { return nums[2]; } return nums[0]; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeæ–æ³¢é‚£å¥‘æ•° /// </summary> /// <param name="n"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int Fib(int n) { if(n == 0) { return 0; } if (n == 1) { return 1; } return Fib(n - 1) + Fib(n - 2); } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeä¸‰ä¸ªæ•°çš„æœ€å¤§ä¹˜ç§¯ /// </summary> /// <param name="nums"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int MaximumProduct(int[] nums) { Array.Sort(nums); return nums[0] * nums[1] * nums[nums.Length - 1] > nums[nums.Length - 1] * nums[nums.Length - 2] * nums[nums.Length - 3] ? nums[0] * nums[1] * nums[nums.Length - 1] : nums[nums.Length - 1] * nums[nums.Length - 2] * nums[nums.Length - 3]; } /// <summary> /// LeetCode Xçš„å¹³æ–¹æ ¹ /// </summary> /// <param name="x"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int MySqrt(int x) { return (int)Math.Sqrt(x); } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeäºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾ /// </summary> /// <param name="nums"></param> /// <param name="target"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int Search(int[] nums, int target) { //Array.Sort(nums); //for (int i = 0; i < nums.Length; i++) //{ // if (nums[i] == target) // { // return i; // } //} //return -1; //äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾ Array.Sort(nums); int start = 0; int end = nums.Length - 1; while (start < end) { int mid = (start + end) / 2; if (nums[mid] == target) { return mid; } if (nums[mid] > target) { end = mid - 1; } if (nums[mid] < target) { start = mid + 1; } } return -1; } /// <summary> /// LeetCodeæ•´æ•°åè½¬ï¼ˆä¸ç¬¦åˆè¦æ±‚ï¼‰ /// </summary> /// <param name="x"></param> /// <returns></returns> public static int Reverse(int x) { string num = string.Empty; if (x < 0) { num = (x * -1).ToString();//å˜æ­£æ•° } else { num = (x * -1).ToString(); } string nums = string.Empty; for (int i = num.Length-1; i >= 0; i--) { //æœ€åä¸€ä½æ˜¯0çš„è¯å°±è·³å‡º if (num[num.Length - 1] == 0) { continue; } nums += num[i].ToString(); } if (x < 0) { return Convert.ToInt32(nums) * -1;//è¿˜åŸç¬¦å· } return Convert.ToInt32(nums); }
